column6: "A LITTLE MURDER" PART 2 (OF 2) For the Avenging Archer, "A Little Murder" means a LOT of trouble! How do you say "WMD" in Russian? Clint better learn fast, because while he's hunting down a long-lost secret of the Afghani/Russian war, a KGB assassin with a rocket in his pocket is hunting him down. An old acquaintance is neck-deep in the mess, as well...but will she turn out to be friend or foe?
column8: | penciller:Joe Bennett | colorist:Tang Animation Coloring | inker:Sandu Florea | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca | writer:Fabian Nicieza
